NAME

pgmbentley - Bentleyize a PGM image  

SYNOPSIS

pgmbentley [pgmfile]  

DESCRIPTION

This program is part of Netpbm.

pgmbentleyreads a PTM image as input and performs the Bentley Effect, and writes a PGM image as output.

The Bentley Effect is described in "Beyond Photography" by Holzmann, chapter 4, photo 4. It's a vertical smearing based on brightness.  

SEE ALSO

pgmoil, ppmrelief, pgm
